SourceProxy.name: EnvimetReader
SourceProxy.label: ENVI-met Reader
SourceProxy.Documentation: The ENVI-met reader reads a file pair of one EDI and one EDT file. The standard extension is .EDI.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the reader.

StringVectorProperty.name: PointArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Point Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which point-centered arrays to read.
